metadata.title: Learning Resources
metadata.description: Curated learning resources, courses, books, and educational content for CS students.

items.title: The Art of Command Line
items.description: Master the command line in one page - a comprehensive guide covering bash, commands, and command-line productivity.

items.title: The Book of Secret Knowledge
items.description: A collection of inspiring lists, manuals, cheatsheets, blogs, hacks, one-liners, cli/web tools, and more for developers and system administrators.
